Originally from Scotland, where she graduated from Stirling University, Hayley has been living in the UAE for 12 years, joining The National in 2018. \nShe has written about all things travel for a range of publications including in-flight titles, consumer magazines and guidebooks, and she was formerly editor of World Traveller magazine. Hayley is also the Dubai ‘local’ for Lonely Planet and a media member of the Adventure Travel Trade Association. \nHappiest when globetrotting, some of her best work has been penned hurtling through India on a train, swaying in a hammock in the Brazilian rainforest and from a snow-covered lodge in the Icelandic Highlands. Specialising in adventure travel and responsible tourism, she uses her time on the road to uncover unique story angles, explore new destinations, review hotels and gather real-world tips to share with The National’s readers. Originally from Scotland, where she graduated from Stirling University, Hayley has been living in the UAE for 12 years, joining The National in 2018. \nShe has written about all things travel for a range of publications including in-flight titles, consumer magazines and guidebooks, and she was formerly editor of World Traveller magazine. Hayley is also the Dubai ‘local’ for Lonely Planet and a media member of the Adventure Travel Trade Association. \nHappiest when globetrotting, some of her best work has been penned hurtling through India on a train, swaying in a hammock in the Brazilian rainforest and from a snow-covered lodge in the Icelandic Highlands. Specialising in adventure travel and responsible tourism, she uses her time on the road to uncover unique story angles, explore new destinations, review hotels and gather real-world tips to share with The National’s readers. Originally from Scotland, where she graduated from Stirling University, Hayley has been living in the UAE for 12 years, joining The National in 2018. \nShe has written about all things travel for a range of publications including in-flight titles, consumer magazines and guidebooks, and she was formerly editor of World Traveller magazine. Hayley is also the Dubai ‘local’ for Lonely Planet and a media member of the Adventure Travel Trade Association. \nHappiest when globetrotting, some of her best work has been penned hurtling through India on a train, swaying in a hammock in the Brazilian rainforest and from a snow-covered lodge in the Icelandic Highlands. Specialising in adventure travel and responsible tourism, she uses her time on the road to uncover unique story angles, explore new destinations, review hotels and gather real-world tips to share with The National’s readers. Originally from Scotland, where she graduated from Stirling University, Hayley has been living in the UAE for 12 years, joining The National in 2018. \nShe has written about all things travel for a range of publications including in-flight titles, consumer magazines and guidebooks, and she was formerly editor of World Traveller magazine. Hayley is also the Dubai ‘local’ for Lonely Planet and a media member of the Adventure Travel Trade Association. \nHappiest when globetrotting, some of her best work has been penned hurtling through India on a train, swaying in a hammock in the Brazilian rainforest and from a snow-covered lodge in the Icelandic Highlands. Specialising in adventure travel and responsible tourism, she uses her time on the road to uncover unique story angles, explore new destinations, review hotels and gather real-world tips to share with The National’s readers. Originally from Scotland, where she graduated from Stirling University, Hayley has been living in the UAE for 12 years, joining The National in 2018. \nShe has written about all things travel for a range of publications including in-flight titles, consumer magazines and guidebooks, and she was formerly editor of World Traveller magazine. Hayley is also the Dubai ‘local’ for Lonely Planet and a media member of the Adventure Travel Trade Association. \nHappiest when globetrotting, some of her best work has been penned hurtling through India on a train, swaying in a hammock in the Brazilian rainforest and from a snow-covered lodge in the Icelandic Highlands. Specialising in adventure travel and responsible tourism, she uses her time on the road to uncover unique story angles, explore new destinations, review hotels and gather real-world tips to share with   <script id="powa-video-script">
   window.addEventListener('powaReady', event => {
        const id = event.detail.id;
        const powa = event.detail.powa;
        // styling the player 
        PoWaSettings.container = PoWaSettings.container || {};
        PoWaSettings.container.style = ".powa-shot {fill: rgb(0 136 255);}.powa-bar .powa-button{background:transparent;border:none;}";


        const localStorageKey = "videos";
        function preserveVideoFromStorage(videoID){
          const rawVidoes = localStorage.getItem(localStorageKey);
          if(rawVidoes){
              const videosList = JSON.parse(rawVidoes);
              if(videosList.includes(videoID)){
                  return videoID;
              }
          }
          // save the video for the first time
          saveVideoToStorage(videoID);
          return null;
        }

        function saveVideoToStorage(videoID){
          const rawVidoes = localStorage.getItem(localStorageKey);
          let videosList = [];
          if(rawVidoes){
            videosList = JSON.parse(rawVidoes);
          }

          if(!videosList.includes(videoID)){
            localStorage.setItem(localStorageKey, JSON.stringify(videosList.concat(videoID)));
          }
        }

        // data 
        const eventCategory = "Leaf page";
        powa.on(PoWa.EVENTS.MEDIA_START, function(evt, eventName) {
          const eventLabel = (evt.videoData.headlines && evt.videoData.headlines.basic) || "";
          const publishDate = evt.videoData.first_publish_date ? new Date(evt.videoData.first_publish_date) : new Date();
          const publisherDate = publishDate.toLocaleDateString();
          const authors = (evt.videoData.credits && evt.videoData.credits.by) && evt.videoData.credits.by.map(item => item?.name || item?.referent?.id).join();
          const eventAction = preserveVideoFromStorage(evt.videoData._id) ? "replay" : "start";
          // send analytics 
          // send GA request
          if (typeof ga !== 'undefined') {
            ga('create', 'UA-18693758-1', 'auto');
            const GAEvent = {
              hitType: 'event',
              eventCategory: eventCategory,
              eventAction: eventAction,
              eventLabel: eventLabel,
              dimension18 : authors || "no Authors",
              dimension17 : publisherDate
            };
            ga('send', GAEvent);
          }
          if(typeof PARSELY !== 'undefined'){
            PARSELY.video.trackPlay(id, {title: eventLabel});
          }
        });

      });
  </script>

  <script>
   if(typeof window !== 'undefined' && "" === 'live-blog'){
      document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded" , ()=>{
        var loaded = false;
        window.setTimeout(function () {
          var elements = document.querySelectorAll("[data-tabindex] , .accordion-item button");
          if(elements.length){
            loaded = true;
            elements.forEach(ele => {
              ele.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                let height = -70;
                document.querySelectorAll('section[role="main"] > *').forEach((ele) => {
                  height += ele.clientHeight;
                });
                console.log("tab height:" + height + " , tab title : " + e.target.innerText)
                if(typeof Android !== 'undefined'){
                  Android.tabClicked(height > 0 ? height : 0);
                }
              })
            })
          }
        },  3000);
      })
  }
  </script>
